name: WordPress Welcome Redirect
author: Robert Janeson

sections.description:
Redirects your website visitors on their first visit to your landing page or any other special pages of your choice.

Why Use WordPress Welcome Redirect On Your Website?

These are few uses of this plugin.

  • Acquire more subscribers to your email list
  • Get more traffic to your landing pages thus increasing conversions
  • Deliver a message to new visitors to your website
  • Introduce a new product or service to your audience

Features

This program is Created By Robert Janeson and it is all his decision to make it free
or sell.This plugin is use for redirection of first time visitor.This plugin work on cookie concept.
This plugin is developed using Advanced Php, javascript & Css.
sections.installation:
Install Easy Facebook Login just as you would any other WP Plugin:

  1. [Download : wp-welcome-gate] from WordPress.org.

  2. Unzip the .zip file.

  3. Upload the Plugin folder (wp-welcome-gate/) to the wp-content/plugins folder.

  4. Go to Plugins Admin Panel and find the newly uploaded Plugin, “Easy Admin CSS” in the list.

  5. Click Activate Plugin to activate it.
sections.faq: Email Robert, the owner at robert@latitudemediaz.com if you have any question.
sections.changelog:
2.0.3

  • Added option so that you can choose to apply redirect effect on whole website, posts only or home page only.

2.0.2

  • Fixed bugs

2.0.1

  • Inital Release
